review_title: One of the best research institute
4years at the ICM: Pros and cons of ICM from a PhD student's observation
pros: - Polyvalent environnement, there are clinicians, biologist engineers, mathematicians, statisticians... There is everything you need to do research and to evolve in your field. - Weekly events and opportunities to discuss with high profile researchers - An overall young population - Nice environnement overall - Good clinical investigation centre - Available of tools (microscopes, mri,...) - Diverse environment, people fro mall cultures and from akl nationalities
cons: - Low salaries (depends on the teams) - Practically no benefits. - Big hallways and small offices -Offices super hot during summer, but reception is with an air conditioners (so you can work there.

pros: Good infrastructure and facilities on campus

pros: Cutting-Edge techniques. Nice Environment. Friendly staff. The HR person for international students and researchers is very heplful
cons: Although it's an internacional institute, most people from platforms do not speak english.
